Posts.Content: Hi Shazbo, I had to cancel mine and reschedule for mon the girl is lovely she knows the situation. It was the nurse in the beatson that told me it wouldn't cover a real hair wig? I went to just plums to see one that I seem online and it looked nothing like the picture, I think you need to just go and try lots and see what suits you. Good luck with your chemo, I hope it's not to hard on you. X. Joyce. X.
Posts.Title: WHAT TYPE OF WIG TO CHOOSE???????

Posts.Content: Hi there, have you been given your form for your wig? I am going to a place called Parruche in Virginia st in the merchant city. you have to phone for an appointment to have a fitting. The NHS voucher won't pay for a real hair wig, but some of the synthetic ones are lovely. Hope this helps Joyce. X.
